Southern Conference Champions |BowlTourney = [[NCAA Division I Football Championship|1-AA National Championship]] |BowlTourneyResult = W 49-29 vs. {{cfb link|year=1996|team=Montana Grizzlies|title=Montana}} }} The '''1996 Marshall Thundering Herd football team''' represented [[Marshall University]] in its final season in NCAA Division I-AA.
